alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 10:09AM PST until December 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the West Side Mountains, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For portions of the San Joaquin Valley, southeast to south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...West Side Mountains and portions of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
